modules.name: mod-playerbots
modules.description: Adds scriptable playerbot characters that can form dungeon parties, raid, and PvP with humans
modules.notes: Installs SQL/config assets; core functionality is built into playerbot images

modules.name: mod-aoe-loot
modules.description: Lets characters loot multiple corpses with one click for faster farming

modules.name: mod-learn-spells
modules.description: Teaches class spells automatically at the correct level to streamline leveling

modules.name: mod-fireworks-on-level
modules.description: Spawns celebratory fireworks whenever a player dings a new level

modules.name: mod-individual-progression
modules.description: Tracks each character through Vanilla → TBC → WotLK progression, unlocking content sequentially

modules.name: mod-ahbot
modules.description: Populates the auction house with configurable buying/selling behavior to keep markets active

modules.name: mod-autobalance
modules.description: Adjusts creature health and damage in real time to keep fights tuned for the current party size

modules.name: mod-transmog
modules.description: Adds a transmogrification vendor so players can restyle gear without changing stats

modules.name: mod-npc-buffer
modules.description: Provides a ready-to-use buff NPC who hands out class buffs, food, and utility spells

modules.name: mod-dynamic-xp
modules.description: Tweaks XP gain based on population or custom rules to keep leveling flexible

modules.name: mod-solo-lfg
modules.description: A solo-friendly queue that lets every player run dungeons without needing a premade group

modules.name: mod-1v1-arena
modules.description: Creates a structured 1v1 ranked arena ladder for duel enthusiasts

modules.name: mod-phased-duels
modules.description: Moves duelers into their own phase to block interference and griefing

modules.name: mod-breaking-news-override
modules.description: Replaces the client breaking-news panel with server-managed announcements

modules.name: mod-boss-announcer
modules.description: Broadcasts dramatic messages when raid bosses fall to your players

modules.name: mod-account-achievements
modules.description: Shares achievements across characters on the same account for persistent milestones

modules.name: mod-auto-revive
modules.description: Automatically resurrects characters on death—handy for casual PvE or testing realms

modules.name: mod-gain-honor-guard
modules.description: Awards honor when players kill city guards, spicing up world PvP raids

modules.name: mod-ale
modules.description: Adds Eluna Lua scripting engine for creating custom gameplay mechanics

modules.name: mod-TimeIsTime
modules.description: Adds experimental time-twisting mechanics suited for custom events

modules.name: mod-pocket-portal
modules.block_reason: Requires C++20 std::format support patch before enabling
modules.description: Gives players a portal gadget for quick travel to configured destinations

modules.name: mod-random-enchants
modules.description: Rolls randomized stat bonuses on loot to add Diablo-style gear chasing

modules.name: mod-solocraft
modules.description: Automatically scales dungeon and raid encounters for solo players or small teams

modules.name: mod-pvp-titles
modules.description: Restores classic honor titles with a configurable ranking ladder

modules.name: mod-npc-beastmaster
modules.description: Adds an NPC who can teach, reset, and manage hunter pets for convenience

modules.name: mod-npc-enchanter
modules.description: Introduces an enchanting vendor who applies enchants directly for a fee

modules.name: mod-instance-reset
modules.description: Adds commands to reset instances quickly—useful for testing or events

modules.name: mod-quest-count-level
modules.description: Enables leveling exclusively through questing by awarding tokens after quest completion

modules.name: mod-arac
modules.description: Unlocks every race/class pairing so players can roll any combination

modules.name: mod-assistant
modules.description: Spawns an all-purpose assistant NPC with heirlooms, professions, and convenience commands

modules.name: mod-reagent-bank
modules.description: Lets players stash crafting reagents with a dedicated banker NPC

modules.name: mod-black-market
modules.description: Backports the Mists-era Black Market Auction House via Eluna scripts

modules.name: mod-challenge-modes
modules.description: Implements keystone-style timed runs with leaderboards and scaling modifiers

modules.name: mod-ollama-chat
modules.description: Connects playerbots to an Ollama LLM so they can chat with humans organically

modules.name: mod-player-bot-level-brackets
modules.description: Keeps bot levels spread evenly across configured brackets

modules.name: StatBooster
modules.description: Lets players refine gear stats by rerolling random enchantments with special materials

modules.name: DungeonRespawn
modules.block_reason: Upstream override signature mismatch (OnBeforeTeleport); awaiting fix
modules.description: Teleports dead players back to the dungeon entrance instead of a distant graveyard

modules.name: skeleton-module
modules.description: Provides a minimal AzerothCore module scaffold for building new features

modules.name: mod-bg-slaveryvalley
modules.description: Adds the Slavery Valley battleground complete with objectives and queue hooks

modules.name: mod-azerothshard
modules.description: Bundles AzerothShard tweaks: utility NPCs, scripted events, and gameplay improvements

modules.name: mod-worgoblin
modules.description: Enables Worgen and Goblin characters with DB/DBC adjustments

modules.name: eluna-ts
modules.description: Adds a TS-to-Lua workflow so Eluna scripts can be authored with modern tooling

modules.name: mod-aio
modules.notes: Azeroth Interface Override - enables client-server interface communication
modules.description: Pure Lua server-client communication system for bidirectional data transmission

modules.name: eluna-scripts
modules.description: Collection of Lua scripts for creating custom gameplay mechanics and features

modules.name: azerothcore-transmog-3.3.5a
modules.description: Transmogrification system built with AIO and Eluna for changing equipment appearance

modules.name: acore-eventscripts
modules.description: Lua scripts that spawn custom NPCs with scripted combat and community events

modules.name: acore-levelupreward
modules.description: Rewards players with in-game mail when reaching certain levels

modules.name: azerothcore-eluna-accountwide
modules.description: Shares achievements, currency, mounts, and reputation across account characters

modules.name: acore-exchangenpc
modules.description: Spawns a customizable NPC vendor that exchanges materials based on settings

modules.name: acore-recruitafriend
modules.description: Implements Recruit-a-Friend system with rewards for reaching level milestones

modules.name: prestige-and-draft-mode
modules.description: Enables characters to reset to level one for prestige rewards with optional spell selection

modules.name: azerothcore-lua-ah-bot
modules.description: Automated auction house bot for buying and selling items

modules.name: lua-hardcoremode
modules.description: Implements hardcore mode system allowing activation via NPC token

modules.name: npcbot-extended-commands
modules.description: Provides gear templates, transmog clearing, and chat features for NPC bots

modules.name: azerothcore-lua-multivendor
modules.description: Enables multiple NPC merchants with database integration

modules.name: treasure-chest-system
modules.description: Allows GMs to create and manage treasure chests with custom loot

modules.name: activechat
modules.description: Populates artificial world and guild chat to make servers feel more lively

modules.name: ultimate-full-loot-pvp
modules.description: Spawns loot chests containing gear and gold when players die in PvP

modules.name: horadric-cube-for-world-of-warcraft
modules.description: Diablo II-inspired crafting system with item synthesis and transmutation

modules.name: acore-carboncopy
modules.description: Enables creating character copies at specific progression points for twinking

modules.name: acore-tempannouncements
modules.description: Allows GMs to create temporary server announcements that repeat at intervals

modules.name: acore-zonecheck
modules.description: Checks player zones and automatically removes players from restricted areas

modules.name: aio-blackjack
modules.description: Implements a Blackjack game for players to gamble against an NPC dealer

modules.name: acore-sendandbind
modules.description: Allows admins to send soulbound items to players via command

modules.name: dynamic-trader
modules.description: Provides auction house alternative with dynamic pricing

modules.name: lottery-lua
modules.description: Implements customizable lottery system where players can win prizes

modules.name: acore-discordnotifier
modules.description: Relays in-game chat events to Discord channels

modules.name: azerothcore-global-mail-banking-auctions
modules.description: Allows access to bank, mailbox, and auction house from anywhere via chat commands
